ISSUE.TITLE: Blank page after filtering; need to click page in pagination to see results
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v12.22.6** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.81.1** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create table with more than 25 records. For example, 30. Therefore, pagination shows with page 1 and 2. 2. Go to the last (second) page 3. Create new filter, that must show less records, for example 20. So pagination show only 1 page 4. We see blank page. To see the filtered records, we need manually click the page 1 in the pagination. **Expected behavior** If filtering changing the number of pages, then we should be automatically directed to the page with records
